title: Trump’s Truth Social takes step toward launching bitcoin ETF with NYSE Arca filing
summary: A division of the New York Stock Exchange has filed to list Trump's Truth Social Bitcoin ETF, a fund launched by Trump Media and Crypto.com that is designed to track the price of bitcoin
